page.title: 06STANDARD TELEPHONES & CABLES
page.content: STC is an example of a company who moved into the area because of the convience of the site.With the M5 only a few miles away they can be in Devon, London,Bristol or Birmingham in under four hours.Taunton is a growing town which provides a steady,reliable work- force. STC have a large factory which is 1/3 offices and 2/3 manufacturing.They em- ploy 170 people (executives,engineers, factory workers-mainly women & sales staff).A few men work round the clock. They make thermistors(2 sorts:directly heated beads or disc type)Thermistors are temperature measuring devices.Uses range from computers and washing mach- ines to cars,telephones and satellite navigation systems. The processes needed to make the beads are soldering,cutting,welding and then making them into discs.
